General.Name: Xinjiang Hejin Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Xinjiang Hejin Holding Co.,Ltd engages in the production and sale of wire rods and high-temperature materials, which are used in metal shackles in China. It is also involved in the sale of alloy wires and alloy bars. The company was formerly known as Shenyang Hejin Holding Investment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xinjiang Hejin Holding Co., Ltd. in October 2017. Xinjiang Hejin Holding Co.,Ltd was founded in 1987 and is based in Hetian, the People's Republic of China.
